title: @Riot remove immobility when casting Quinn R?
body: not a good mechanic, even minion attacks interrupt the cast :/, make her mobile when using R but keep the channeling and increase channeling to 2.5 please

replies.body: For an extra .5s, I could definitely see her moving and using it, even if it meant, like, a 10% slow so it won't be overly abused when chasing.
